programme.title: Never Kiss a Man in a Christmas Sweater
programme.desc: A single mom faces Christmas alone until a stranger crashes into her life and becomes an unexpected houseguest.

programme.title: Christmas in Montana
programme.desc: An efficiency expert goes to Montana before the holidays and attempts to help a man save his ranch.

programme.title: Mystery on Mistletoe Lane
programme.desc: New to town, Heidi Wicks and her kids discover a Christmas mystery in their historic home. Local handyman and historian David helps along the way, finding his own surprising connection.

programme.title: Mistletoe Murders
programme.desc: The murder of the town Scrooge leads Emily and other shopkeepers to a Christmas Carol themed scavenger hunt orchestrated by the victim; Emily tries to keep Sam at arm's length.

programme.title: Mistletoe Murders
programme.desc: As Christmas draws closer, Emily continues to solve the scavenger hunt while also tracking a killer; Violet plans a surprise for Sam; Emily's mysterious past complicates her future.

programme.title: Merry Christmas, Ted Cooper!
programme.desc: An unlucky weatherman hopes to share his Christmastime cheer with his high school crush.

programme.title: Christmas at the Plaza
programme.desc: When historian Jessica is hired to create the Plaza's Christmas display, she finds more than facts while teaming up with handsome decorator Nick to bring the display to life.

programme.title: All I Need for Christmas
programme.desc: Looking for inspiration, singer-songwriter Maggie travels home and finds a spark with app developer Archer, who is trying to repair his relationship with his sister.

programme.title: Gingerbread Miracle
programme.desc: A man and an old high school friend try to sell his uncle's business -- a Mexican bakery that's famous for magical gingerbread cookies that grant wishes.

programme.title: My Christmas Family Tree
programme.desc: A woman meets long-lost relatives for the first time after discovering her family tree during the holidays.

programme.title: Silver Bells
programme.desc: A teenage runaway (Michael Mitchell) connects his widowed father (Tate Donovan) and a woman (Anne Heche) who lost her husband during a past Christmas holiday.

programme.title: Time for Him to Come Home for Christmas
programme.desc: Four days before Christmas, Elizabeth Athens receives a voicemail from a number she doesn't recognize. On the message, a man she doesn't know makes one final plea for the love of his life to give him a second chance.

programme.title: A Glenbrooke Christmas
programme.desc: As Christmas nears, heiress Jessica Morgan seizes what seems like her last chance to experience a relaxed Christmas and heads off to the small town of Glenbrooke, where she meets a handsome fireman.

programme.title: Long Lost Christmas
programme.desc: Hayley is an interior designer who plans to surprise her recently widowed mother with the perfect holiday present -- the extended family she knows her mom yearns for.

programme.title: The Sweetest Christmas
programme.desc: A struggling pastry chef is thrilled to learn that she has made it to the finals of the American Gingerbread Competition, but distractions in her love life threaten to derail her dreams of taking home the grand prize.

programme.title: A Veteran's Christmas
programme.desc: Capt. Grace Garland, a decorated U.S. veteran, returns home after two tours of search and rescue in Afghanistan. After being separated from her beloved K9 partner, Grace must rediscover the magic of Christmas.

programme.title: Christmas Wishes & Mistletoe Kisses
programme.desc: Weeks before Christmas, an interior designer is hired to decorate the estate of a wealthy businessman.

programme.title: A Godwink Christmas: Meant for Love
programme.desc: A chance meeting at a weekend wedding celebration brings together Alice and Jack, two singles from very different family backgrounds.

programme.title: A Homecoming for the Holidays
programme.desc: Country singer Charlotte is home for the holidays and works with her brother's friend to build a house for a friend in town.

programme.title: A Godwink Christmas: Miracle of Love
programme.desc: Joy and Eric find a new sense of purpose -- and get a chance at love -- as they work together to build a home for a family during Christmastime.

programme.title: The Christmas Train
programme.desc: A cynical journalist must get from Washington, D.C., to Los Angeles in time for Christmas, and his only option is to take the train.

programme.title: Christmas for Keeps
programme.desc: During Christmastime, some childhood friends return home after 10 years to take part in a celebration of life for their beloved high school teacher.

programme.title: The Christmas Ring
programme.desc: Reporter Kendra Adams searches for the love story behind an antique engagement ring with the help of the grandson of the ring's owner.

programme.title: Operation Nutcracker
programme.desc: When an antique nutcracker set to be auctioned at the Warby family Christmas charity goes missing, a demanding event planner and the heir to the Warby dynasty try to track it down.

programme.title: Cranberry Christmas
programme.desc: A separated couple feign marital bliss on national television to help their town's Christmas festival and their business, but rekindled love is complicated by new opportunities.

programme.title: Hearts of Christmas
programme.desc: When a beloved neonatal intensive care unit supervisor is forced to take early retirement, her young colleague, Jenny, decides to turn the staff Christmas party into a surprise bash for her, but the plan is complicated by the hospital's new CFO.

programme.title: A Nashville Christmas Carol
programme.desc: A workaholic television producer receives a visit from her recently deceased mentor, who warns her that her current path leads to a dark future.

programme.title: We Need a Little Christmas
programme.desc: Facing her first Christmas as a single mother, Julie develops an unexpected friendship with an older neighbor.

programme.title: A Blue Ridge Mountain Christmas
programme.desc: Hotel manager Willow returns to her stunning Virginia hometown to help her sister plan a Christmas wedding at the inn her family once owned.

programme.title: A Season for Family
programme.desc: Maddy's adopted son, Wesley, has just one wish for Christmas -- to meet his brother, Cody, who was adopted into a different family. Circumstances soon bring the two siblings together while sparks fly between their respective parents.

programme.title: Homegrown Christmas
programme.desc: When forced to work together to organize a Christmas dance for the local high school, former sweethearts find themselves rediscovering what made them fall in love all those years ago.

programme.title: A Godwink Christmas

programme.title: A Timeless Christmas
programme.desc: A man travels from 1903 to 2020, where he meets a tour guide at his historic mansion and gets to experience a 21st century Christmas.

programme.title: Christmas Cookies
programme.desc: A corporate agent is sent to a small town to buy a cookie company and shut down its factory. When she starts falling in love with the factory's owner, the town's Christmas spirit overtakes her.

programme.title: Magic Stocking
programme.desc: Lindsey, a widowed single mother, stays closed off to life after losing her husband. When she buys a stocking at a craft fair, her family members begin finding items in it that have importance in their lives.

programme.title: Christmas in Vienna
programme.desc: A dispirited concert violinist travels to Vienna for a performance and finds the inspiration she has been missing.

programme.title: Holly & Ivy
programme.desc: A contractor helps a woman renovate a house so she can adopt a sick neighbor's two children.

programme.title: Making Spirits Bright
programme.desc: A man and a woman from rival families try to mend their respective fathers' decades-old feud. They soon find romance along the way as they compete in a holiday decorating contest.

programme.title: The Christmas Charade
programme.desc: Facing another dull Christmas alone, sparks fly when a risk-averse librarian accidentally gets wrapped up with a grinchy FBI agent in an undercover mission to save the Heart of Christmas.

programme.title: Mistletoe Murders: Peril of the Belles
programme.desc: After a string of suspicious accidents, Emily goes under cover in the local choir to investigate.

programme.title: Northern Lights of Christmas
programme.desc: Life deals Zoey Hathaway a strange blow when she inherits a reindeer farm and becomes buried in taking care of the animals and all of the Christmas responsibilities.

programme.desc: After 15 years, a single father moves home from Hawaii with his two sons and, through a series of coincidences -- or Godwinks, ends up stuck in traffic next to his high school sweetheart.
